___theme.fontsize.description:
Specifies the base font size
(Default size - 24)

___theme.editorFontFamily.description: Specifies the font family for the editors

___request.withCredentials.description: Specifies if requests should be sent with credentials (with cookies) or not

___addQueryDepthLimit.description: Specifies how deep the 'Add query' functionality would go

___enableExperimental.description:
Enable experimental features in Altair.
Note: The features might be unstable.

___plugin.list.description: Specifies a list of enabled plugins (requires enableExperimental to be true)

___tabSize.description: Specifies the tab size in the editor

___disablePushNotification.description: Specifies if the push notifications should be disabled

___schema.reloadOnStart.description: Specifies if the schema should be reloaded when the app starts
